NotLoggedTitle.message: Create an account and start finding out what you are accepting.

ifAccountText.description: in case the user already has an account

buttonPrivacy.description: Select the summary of privacy policies

loadingTermsOfUseText.description: text of the loading screen while generating summaries

loadingPrivacyPoliciesText.description: text of the loading screen while generating summaries

warningClosePopup.message: Warning: Closing the extension window while it is loading will cause progress to be lost and credits needed to generate the summary will still be charged.
warningClosePopup.description: displays the warning that the summary is lost when you close the window

warningInfo.message: Warning: This summary has been generated with Artificial Intelligence and may contain errors or missing information. If you are concerned about a specific issue, we recommend that you review the original policy and consult with an attorney.
warningInfo.description: displays a warning that this summary may contain errors.
